name: Virtual Host Ready & Unacked Messages
Queue Length & Consumers
queries:
sum by (instance, vhost, queue) (rabbitmq_detailed_queue_consumers)
* on(instance) group_left(rabbitmq_cluster, rabbitmq_node) rabbitmq_identity_info
sum by (instance, vhost, queue) (rabbitmq_detailed_queue_messages)
* on(instance) group_left(rabbitmq_cluster, rabbitmq_node) rabbitmq_identity_info

name: Queue Ready & Unacked Messages
